snippet: In a performance event at Dixon Place, scholars and performers prove that you can send up an academic field like queer theory and honor it all the same.
abstract: Dixon Place, downtown performance space, hosts combined book party and cabaret show entitled Otherwise: Queer Scholarship Into Song; event features dozen queer theory scholars and performers interpreting their recently published books through music.
lead_paragraph: In a performance event at Dixon Place, scholars and performers prove that you can send up an academic field like queer theory and honor it all the same.

headline.seo: ‘Otherwise: Queer Scholarship Into Song,’ at Dixon Place
headline.main: Queer Theory May Not Have a Beat, but Academicians Can Still Dance to It
headline.print_headline: Queer Theory May Not Have a Beat, but Academicians Can Still Dance to It
